divs: Sighting DetailsSaw Airplane passing overhead with 3 silver objests behind it, Ads I watched it go past heading east towards gulf of Mexico I saw a fighter following the plane and silver objects. I was in my backyard watering the grass. I always tend to look for planes in sky. I am not sure what the objects were, just that they were following airplane. I was dumbfounded and just kept watching till I couldn't see anymore.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Laguna Vista
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 3 objects following airplane then followed by fighter jet.
